sourcesContent: import{useMemo as t,useCallback as r,useState as e,useEffect as n}from"react";import{range as i}from"../utils/numbers";export const DOTS="dots";export default({page:o,total:a,siblings:s=1,boundaries:u=1,initialPage:c=1,onChange:f})=>{const[m,g]=e(o||c),l=t=>{g(t),f&&f(t)};n((()=>{o&&o!==m&&g(o)}),[o]);const p=r((t=>{l(t<=0?1:t>a?a:t)}),[a]);return{range:t((()=>{if(2*s+3+2*u>=a)return i(1,a);const t=Math.max(m-s,u),r=Math.min(m+s,a-u),e=t>u+2,n=r<a-(u+1);if(!e&&n){return[...i(1,2*s+u+2),DOTS,...i(a-(u-1),a)]}if(e&&!n){const t=u+1+2*s;return[...i(1,u),DOTS,...i(a-t,a)]}return[...i(1,u),DOTS,...i(t,r),DOTS,...i(a-u+1,a)]}),[a,s,m]),active:m,setPage:p,next:()=>p(m+1),previous:()=>p(m-1),first:()=>p(1),last:()=>p(a)}};
